mapper.select: select * from goods where 1=1 and goods_kind_unique=#{goods_kind_uniuqe} and goods_barcode like '%'||#{goods_barcode}||"%" and goods_alias like '%'||#{goods_alias}||"%" and goods_name like "%"||#{goods_name}||"%" and goods_id like "%"||#{goods_id}||"%" and goods_brand like "%"||#{goods_brand}||"%"

select goods_id,g.shop_unique,g.goods_barcode,g.goods_brand,g.goods_name,g.goods_alias,goods_in_price,goods_sale_price,goods_count,supplier_name,goods_price, g.goods_life,goods_points,g.goods_address,g.goods_discount,g.goods_contain,g.goods_picturepath,g.goods_kind_unique,u.supplier_unique,goods_standard,goods_remarks,l.goods_kind_name , l.goods_kind_unique parunique ,k.goods_kind_name name from goods g left join goods_kind k on g.goods_kind_unique=k.goods_kind_unique left join goods_kind l on k.goods_kind_parunique=l.goods_kind_unique left join supplier u on g.default_supplier_unique=u.supplier_unique left join sup_goods o on g.goods_barcode= o.goods_barcode and g.default_supplier_unique=o.supplier_unique where 1=1 and g.goods_barcode=#{goods_barcode} and g.shop_unique=#{shop_unique}

select goods_id,g.shop_unique,goods_barcode,goods_brand,goods_name,goods_alias,goods_in_price,goods_sale_price,goods_promotion, goods_life,goods_points,goods_address,goods_discount,goods_contain,goods_picturepath,g.goods_kind_unique,default_supplier_unique,goods_standard,goods_remarks,goods_kind_group,goods_kind_name from goods g left join goods_kind k on g.goods_kind_unique=k.goods_kind_unique where 1=1 and goods_name like '%'||#{goods_name}||'%'

select goods_name,goods_barcode,goods_sale_price,goods_in_price from ( (select goods_name,goods_barcode ,goods_sale_price,goods_in_price from goods g where goods_name like #{goods_message} and shop_unique=#{shop_unique}) union (select goods_name,goods_barcode ,goods_sale_price,goods_in_price from goods g where goods_barcode like #{goods_message} and shop_unique=#{shop_unique}) union (select goods_name,goods_barcode ,goods_sale_price,goods_in_price from goods g where goods_alias like #{goods_message} and shop_unique=#{shop_unique}) union (select goods_name,goods_barcode ,goods_sale_price,goods_in_price from goods g where goods_brand like #{goods_message} and shop_unique=#{shop_unique}) ) a
limit #{page_start},#{page_size}
mapper.delete: delete from goods where goods_barcode=#{goods_barcode} and shop_unique=#{shop_unique}
